programme.title: Síbín Lá Fhéile Pádraig
programme.desc: Tá comhluadar den scoth sa síbín do Lá Fhéile Pádraig. (A cosmopolitan array of guests drop in for a song and a chat for St. Patrick's Day.)

programme.title: GAA 2025
programme.desc: Buaicphointí CLG ó chluichí i sraitheanna Allianz agus ó chluichí liathróid láimhe. (The weekend's best GAA action from the Allianz leagues as well as handball highlights.)

programme.title: Timpeall na Tíre
programme.desc: Achoimre ar chuid de mhórscéalta na seachtaine mar a craoladh ar Nuacht TG4. (Some of the stories from this week's regional news as seen on Nuacht TG4.)

programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Bréidín & Clúmh
programme.desc: Tá Clúmh ag iarraidh chuile shórt a aimsíonn Bréidín a ithe! (Fluff is trying to eat everything Tweedy finds.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Tá YoYo ag iarraidh a bheith cosúil le Mamaí. (Mommies can do so much for their kids! Let's watch and sing as YoYo tries to be like mom! Happy Mother's Day!)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Tagann ordú ollmhór de mhuifíní isteach chuig daide Cody. (Cody's Dad takes on a huge muffin order and becomes overwhelmed.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Tá sé im am codlata! Cuirfidh amhrán Mhamaí agus J.J. chun suain tú. (It's almost bedtime! Sing along with Mom and J.J. while you get ready for bed.)

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Tugann na páistí ar fad cuairt ar an Teach Dóiteáin. (All the children pay a visit to the Firehouse.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Tugann Buster faoi deara ar a bhealach abhaile go bhfuil an criú atá ar láithreán tógála ag streachailt. (Buster sees the crew struggling on a building site on his way home.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Téann Buster agus a chara sa tóir ar a gcairrín bréige lá garbh. (Buster and his friend look for their toy car on a windy day.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Téann Buster ag snámh agus feiceann sé siorc! (Buster goes for a nice swim in the ocean when he comes across a shark!)

programme.title: Abby's Amazing Adventure
programme.desc: Caithfidh Abby agus Rudy lón a réiteach do na gasúir ar fad ar scoil. (Abby and Rudy are at school, their job is to cook lunch for all the kids at school.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Tabharfaidh na hOlobobanna cúnamh do Thromach Tramach a ghuth a aimsiú. (The Olobobs help a sad Topsy Turvy to find its singing voice.)

programme.title: Igam Ogam
programme.desc: Ba mhaith le Igam Ogam go mbeadh a cuid cairde ar fad salach. (Igam Ogam tries to get her playmates dirty.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Beirtear ar Owlette i luíochán agus faigheann sí amach go gcuirfidh a srón féin comhairle uirthi. (Owlette learns it's better to rely on her instincts after she's lured into a trap.)

programme.title: Wussywat
programme.desc: Tá Wussywat ag iarraidh bealach a fháil le fanacht tirim sa bháisteach. (Wussywat wants to know how to stay dry now the rain has started.)

programme.title: Woozle & Pip
programme.desc: Insíonn Woozle cúpla bréag beag a chuireann faitíos ar a chuid cairde. (Woozle's little lies give his friends a big fright!)

programme.title: Chip & Potato
programme.desc: Tá tochas ar Chip mar gheall ar spotaí smutacha! (Chip's got itchy puggy spots!)

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Téann Gingers agus na Piseanna-Rex Óga amú ar an mbealach abhaile. (While leading the baby Pea-Rexes home, Ginger gets lost.)

programme.title: Momonsters
programme.desc: Foghlaimíonn na Momonsters le dinglis a chur ina chéile. Bíonn siad ar fad ag gáire seachas Hóhó. (The Momonsters learn how to tickle each other. They all laugh except Hoho.)

programme.title: Gus an Ridire Beag Bídeach
programme.desc: Tá Gus ag gealladh go leor do dhaoine go leor. (Gus has been making promises all over the place.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Tá Lola chun an oíche a chaitheamh tigh Lotta. (Lola is going to stay at Lotta's house for the night.)

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: Féachann MacTrapp le moncaí a ghoid ach tá trioblóid go leor ag baint leis an moncaí céanna. (MacTrapp tries to steal a capuchin monkey but the monkey creates a world of trouble.)

programme.title: Banainmhithe
programme.desc: Caithfidh Ailfí rudaí a chur ina gceart le Ruairí. (Ruairí loses trust in Alfie. Now Alfie has to make things right.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Caithfidh Angelo agus a cairde an t-ionad spóirt a ghlanadh - mar a bheadh físchluiche ann. (Angelo and his friends must clean up the rec centre - videogame style.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Tá Angelo agus Lola le cúnamh a thabhairt do Sherwood áit a fháil sa gCampa Spáis. (Angelo and Lola help Sherwood get into Space Camp.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi bheith sásta a bheidh againn inniu. (A fun song about being happy!)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Beidh an-spraoi ag na Blocuimhreacha ag dul i bhfolach inniu! (The number friends take turns hiding behind each other in a song and dance all about bigger and smaller.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Bíonn spraoi ag na Clódóirí ag déanamh dathanna éagsúla. (The Printing Crew have lots of fun making different colours.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Tá YoYo ag iarraidh a bheith cosúil le Mamaí. (Mommies can do so much for their kids! Let's watch and sing as YoYo tries to be like mom! Happy Mother's Day!)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Tagann ordú ollmhór de mhuifíní isteach chuig daide Cody. (Cody's Dad takes on a huge muffin order and becomes overwhelmed.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Céard a theastaíonn le líreacáin reoite a dhéanamh? Tá TomTom, Yoyo agus J.J. lena ndéanamh! (It's the perfect day for rainbow popsicles, but what ingredients do we need?)

programme.title: Scéal an Lae
programme.desc: Is í Niamh Ní Chróinín a bheidh ag léamh scéal an lae inniu. (Today's story of the day is read by Niamh Ní Chróinín.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Cé hé an t-ealaíontóir rúnda? (Who is the mystery artist?)

programme.title: Bígí ag Ceol
programme.desc: Amhrán faoi chnaipí a bhrú a bheidh le cumadh ar an gclár seo. (On this episode we write a song about pressing buttons.)

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid
programme.desc: Tá faitíos ar Dhris bocht roimh thoirneach agus tá sé ina stoirm amuigh. (Poor Dris is afraid of thunder and they are in the middle of a huge storm.)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Tá George le bád nua a dhéanamh do Bill. (George decides to build a new boat for Bill for the Model Boat Show after he discovers that Bill's old boat sinks!)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Isabelle an saol ina blagálaí nuair a bheidh sí mór le cúnamh ó Shióg na bPost. (Isabelle imagines her life as a Blogger when she grows up.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Caitheann Daisy agus Ollie an lá ina gcúiréirí. (Daisy and Ollie become couriers for the day.)

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Tá Lola ag iarraidh a carr, atá in ann eitilt, a thaispeáint don bhaile. (Lola looks to put up a show at the park in her flying car.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Púdail ag léim agus piongainí gleoite a bheidh ar chlár an lae inniu. (Today we have jumping poodles and cute penguins.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is í Áine Durkin as Conamara ó dhúchas a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín ar an gclár seo. (Máirtín Tom Sheáinín chats with Áine Durkin originally from Co. Galway.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Tá Kevin i ndroch-chaoi mar go bhfuil Winnie agus a muintir tar éis bogadh i bhfad ó bhaile. (Kevin is devastated when Winnie's family moves.)

programme.title: Geantraí

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Níl Rose an-chinnte di féin sa gcaidreamh atá aici le hollamh ollscoile. (Rose feels insecure about her romance with a college professor.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Táthar in amhras go raibh baint ag neacht Jessica le dúnmharú. (Jessica's niece, an actress in a daytime drama, becomes a suspect when the head writer for the show is murdered.)

programme.title: Réalta agus Gaolta

programme.title: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn

programme.title: Glór Tíre Rogha & Togha
